en.banner: Fostering transparency and dialogue on climate issues in Switzerland.

intro.title: Why It Matters
intro.text: Under the Swiss Freedom of Information Act (BGÖ/FOIA), transparency in government actions is crucial for accountability on climate mitigation measures—such as sustainable energy policies, glacier preservation, and alpine water storage projects. With rising Alpine temperatures, effective cooling strategies (forestry, high-albedo surfaces) and resilient infrastructure prevent irreversible glacier loss and secure drinking water reserves.

disclosures: 2024 Glacier Melt Report: 15% Alpine Ice Loss
en.about: Open Gov Climate consolidates BGÖ/FOIA requests and responses on temperature-mitigating initiatives and water storage capabilities in the Swiss Alps. It empowers citizens to monitor government action and fosters data-driven dialogue.
